item.title: Eric add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "I am for doing good to the poor, but...I think the best way of doing good to the poor, is not making them easy in poverty, but leading or driving them out of it. I observed...that the more public provisions were made for the poor, the less they provided for themselves, and of course became poorer. And, on the contrary, the less was done for them, the more they did for themselves, and became richer." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Eric add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eric add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Eric add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Try a little harder to be a little better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Eric add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If Life Gets Too Hard To Stand, Kneel." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Eric add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "True love is not so much a matter of romance as it is a matter of anxious concern for the well-being of one's companion." -- Gordon B. Hinckley
